text: Brent Sanford (born December 23, 1971) is an American politician. He was the 38th Lieutenant Governor of North Dakota from 2016 to 2023. He is a member of the Republican Party. He was Mayor of Watford City from 2010 to 2016. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Businesspeople from North Dakota Category:Lieutenant Governors of North Dakota Category:American mayors Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Brent Sanford
